name: Taniku Defense Force
description:
You control a robot that can plant and command Taniku, which are friendly plant creatures that will gather resources and fight for you. Your mission is to destroy all enemy hives on the planet by commanding your Taniku forces.

Music:
"Jazz Brunch " Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
